data_descriptor.name: arrival_time_around_beacon
data_descriptor.description: Office arrival time (entering time into the office location) according to beacon model

data_descriptor.name: verdict
data_descriptor.description: Analysis of the arrival time which is one of the three verdict: 1. before_usual_time 2. after_usual_time 3. usual_time. Usual time is a range from (mean - standard_deviation) to (mean + standard_deviation). The arrival time which are earlier than usual range are before_usual_time and the arrival time which are later than the usual range are after_usual_time .

data_descriptor.name: deviation
data_descriptor.description: How much deviated from the usual time (in minutes).

algorithm.description: Office arrival time with verdict of before, after or usual arriving. Sample is a list with three elements as follows: 0 - Office arrival time according to beacon, 1 - verdict (after_usual_time, before_usual_time, usual_time), 2 - deviation from the usual range of time in minutes. All arrival data are according to beacon
